<<<<<<< HEAD
Harmonia sacra, or, Divine hymns and dialogues Second book. : with a thorow-bass for the theorbo-lute, bass-viol, harpsichord, or organ / composed by the best masters of the last and present age ; the words by several learned and pious persons. Playford, Henry, b. 1657. Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695. Gribelin, Simon, 1661 or 2-1733.
1 score (vol. 2 of 2)
Printed by Edward Jones for Henry Playford ..., [London] In the Savoy : 1693.
Preface signed: Henry Playford. Edited in part by Henry Purcell. For 1-3 voices with bass (part figured) Volume 2 has added engraved t.p. signed: S. Gribelin inven. et sculps. V. 1 is found at reel 506:8; v. 2 is found at reel 1709:6. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
=======

Playford, Henry, b. 1657. Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695. Gribelin, Simon, 1661 or 2-1733.
1 score (vol. 2 of 2)
Printed by Edward Jones for Henry Playford ..., [London] In the Savoy : 1693.
Preface signed: Henry Playford. Edited in part by Henry Purcell. For 1-3 voices with bass (part figured) Volume 2 has added engraved t.p. signed: S. Gribelin inven. et sculps. V. 1 is found at reel 506:8; v. 2 is found at reel 1709:6. Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
